issue.title: gcd / lcm and bool for the WP

discussion.p: With the acceptance of gcd and lcm in the working draft, the same problem as pointed out by LWG exists here as well and should be fixed accordingly.
Monday PM: Moved to Tentatively Ready

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4606.

blockquote.pre: template<class M, class N> constexpr common_type_t<M, N> gcd(M m, N n);

blockquote.p:
[…]
-2- Remarks: If either M or N is not an integer type, or if either is (possibly cv-qualified) bool, the program is ill-formed.
